(1) Open the fridge
(2) Grasp an ice cube from the fridge
(3) Open the bottom cabinet
(4) Grasp the glass from the bottom cabinet
(5) Put the ice cube into the glass
(6) Grasp the straw from the bottom cabinet
(7) Put the straw into the glass
